description:
Empowering Ruby Developers

Cross-platform Ruby on Rails IDE with first-class support for Ruby-related technologies.
RubyMine 2024.3 is Out!
Visit our website or read the blog post to learn about the latest new features and improvements.
Here are the highlights:
- Enhanced cloud-based code completion: RUBY-33170
- Inline AI prompts: IJPL-161819
- Kamal 2 support: RUBY-33404
- Nilability annotations from schema.rb for type support: RUBY-33410
- Code insight for Solid Queue and Solid Cache: RUBY-33418
- Built-in integration with the RBS Collection: RUBY-32134
- Ability to use it as an alias for numbered parameters in blocks: RUBY-33225
- Support for Ruby 3.4 "chilled" strings: RUBY-33231
- Error annotations for ambiguous anonymous arguments: RUBY-33226
- Bundled spelling and grammar checks powered by Grazie: RUBY-26069
For the full list of closed issues, refer to the release notes.
